paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a novel TTR variant D18G associated with meningocerebrovascular amyloidosis, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: This mutation is associated with meningocerebrovascular amyloidosis, producing dementia, ataxia, and spasticity.

functional_data.summary: The mutation leads to amyloid deposition affecting the central nervous system.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is novel and has not been previously reported.
key_quotes: We describe a novel transthyretin mutation at codon 18 where Asp is replaced by Gly (D18G) in a Hungarian kindred.

extraction_metadata.notes: Full text was available for extraction.
